contents:
39 Pothole Pete had an abysmal record at DOT.  UFB. posted 10 hours ago by KuzoKevin 1 comments award share report block Secretary Sean Duffy @SecDuffy • 20h No Show Pete wants to try and rewrite his abysmal record at DOT. There’s no pothole big enough to hide all of his failures. Pete Buttigieg @PeteButtigieg • 2d Why is Trump going after America's air traffic controllers, today of all days? It's one more way to distract from his decision to increase your health insurance premiums.
1 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web T471 2 points 9 hours ago I wonder how if he remembers bike gate or sitting in a hospital bed with a man in surgery gown acting like they gave birth to a child, and don't forget the meme that shows him wearing fake breast feeding gear acting like its normal. That kid is going to grow up on SSRI's. Should we do the bridges next or maybe the over passes? I dislike these people so much. permalink award report block reply
